snippet: Casablanca Capital, the activist hedge fund pressing for change at Cliffs Natural Resources, started a proxy fight on Thursday, naming six candidates for the mining company’s board.
abstract: Casablanca Capital, the activist hedge fund pressing for change at Cliffs Natural Resources, started a proxy fight on Thursday, naming six candidates for the mining company’s board.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Casablanca Names 6 Candidates for Cliffs Natural Resources' Board
